dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
Date: 25 Sep 2007

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
U.S.A.

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints [Fax: [private]]

Dear Sirs

Infringement Notification for Google Blogger
1. I am the author and copyright holder of the original articles in my blog at: http://tips-for-now-bloggers.blogspot.com

Among the copyright protected material are these articles at:
1. http://tipsfor-new-bloggers.blogspot.com/2007/03/hide-or-remove-navbar-in-blogger.html
2. http://tips-for-new-bloggers.blogspot.com/2007/03/language.translation.flags-and-script.html
3. http://tips-for-new-bloggers.blogspot.com/2007/05/adsense-code-in-blogger-post-body.html
4. http://tips-for-new-bloggers.blogspot.com/2007/03/add-digg-button-to-blogger-or-blogspot.html
3

2. I found out that another site had reproduced the above mentioned material without my permission.  The infringing material are:

1. http://bloggerntricks.blogspot.com/2007/08/hide-or-remove-navbar-in-blogger.html
2. http://bloggerntricks.blogspot.com/2007/08/language-translation-flags-and-script.html
3. http://bloggerntricks.blogspot.com/2007/08/adsense-code-in-blogger-post-body.html
4. http://bloggerntricks.blogspot.com/2007/08/add-digg-button-to-blogger-or-blogspot.html

Please also note: _____________

3. I can be reached at owned [private]@yahoo.com
4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours faithfully,

[page 2]
Date: 25 Sep 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google's Legal Support, Blogger DMCA complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
U.S.A.

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints [Fax: [private]]

Dear Sirs

Infringement Notification for Google Blogger
1. I am the author and copyright holder of the original articles in my blog at:

Among the copyright protected material are these articles at:

4. http://tips-for-new-bloggers.blogspot.com/2007/07/adsense-product-referrals-in-blogger.html

2. I found out that other sites had reproduced the above mentioned material without my permission.  The infringing materials are:
1. http://howwecan.blogspot.com/2007/08/add-favican-icon-to-blogger-url.html
2. http://howwecan.blogspot.com/2007/09/social-bookmarking-links-in-blogger.html
3. http://blogmakesyourich.blogspot.com/2007/09/add-icon-to-blogger-url.html
4. http://untukbisnis.blogspot.com/2007/09/adsense.html
5. http://thai-seo.blogspot.com/2007/07/tip.refferal-adsense.html

Please also note: ___________________________

3. I can be reached at [private]@yahoo.com
4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[page 3]

Date: 25 Sep 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn:  Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
U.S.A.

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints [Fax: [private]]
Dear Sirs
Infringement Notification for Google Blogger
1. I am the author and copyright holder of the original articles in my blog at:
http://tips-for-new-blogger.blogspot.com

Among the copyright protected material are these articles at:
1. http://tips-for-new bloggers.blogspot.com

2. I found out that another site had reproduced the above mentioned material without my permission.  The infringing material are:
http://makeingcashonline.blogspot.com

Please also note: This site hijacked my source code and reproduced everything, right down to my adsense and link codes.  Can blogger please remove this URL entirely and ban this person's ISP because such hijack is an abuse of the system.

3. I can be reached at [private]@yahoo.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours faithfully
